glossary.definition: Lacking restraint, or ignoring societal standards, particularly in sexual conduct.
glossary.example: He was fired from the company after repeated complaints to HR about his licentious behavior towards his peers.

glossary.definition: (often in the plural) A mark or expression of applause; praise bestowed.
glossary.example: It is not wise to your daughter for every good deed she does, for this would teach her to only do good for the sake of others' validation.

glossary.definition: Something capable of causing fire, particularly a weapon.
glossary.example: The military used incendiaries to destroy the building. Fortunately, the fire didn't spread.
At work, I usually see Tom very happy, outgoing, and full of energy, but for the past few days, he has been very quiet, listless, and reserved.
How about we actually work together to fix the problem instead of spending over ad infinitum playing the blame game.
